about.description: Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. This version contains the complete 897 character set, which includes the standard ISO Latin 1, Latin CE, Greek and Cyrillic character sets. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
about.summary: OpenSans variable and static TTF fonts

about.description: Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. This version contains the complete 897 character set, which includes the standard ISO Latin 1, Latin CE, Greek and Cyrillic character sets. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
about.summary: OpenSans variable and static TTF fonts

name: font-ttf-opensans
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: font-ttf-opensans
  version: 3.003
  ref: bd7e37632246368c60fdcbd374dbf9bad11969b6

package:
  name: ${{ name }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://github.com/googlefonts/opensans/archive/${{ ref }}.zip
    sha256: 540fb1a06b727f1b07d036f0239a3211800dd5d60de9b3eb39aef1dfbbbeeac5

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  script:
    - mkdir -p $PREFIX/fonts
    - cp fonts/variable/*.ttf $PREFIX/fonts/
    - cp fonts/ttf/*.ttf $PREFIX/fonts/

tests:
  - package_contents:
      files:
        # variable
        - fonts/OpenSans-Italic\[wdth,wght\].ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans\[wdth,wght\].ttf
        # static
        - fonts/OpenSans-Bold.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-BoldItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedBold.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedBoldItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedExtraBold.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedExtraBoldItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedLight.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedLightItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedRegular.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedSemiBold.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-CondensedSemiBoldItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-ExtraBold.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-Italic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-Light.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-LightItalic.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-Regular.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-SemiBold.ttf
        - fonts/OpenSans-SemiBoldItalic.ttf
      strict: true

about:
  homepage: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans
  repository: https://github.com/googlefonts/opensans
  summary: OpenSans variable and static TTF fonts
  description: |
    Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. This version contains the complete 897 character set, which includes the standard ISO Latin 1, Latin CE, Greek and Cyrillic character sets. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
  license: OFL-1.1
  license_file: OFL.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ytausch
